targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_ambassadors FROM community_ambassadors;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS discord_posts FROM discord_messages dm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS telegram_posts FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo();
SELECT COUNT(*) AS x_posts FROM x_posts xp JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON xp.username = ca.x_handle WHERE xp.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND xp.created_at <= $__timeTo();

SELECT ca.ambassador AS "Ambassador", ca.role AS "Role", ca.x_handle AS "X Handle", COALESCE(discord_posts.posts, 0) AS "Discord Posts", COALESCE(telegram_posts.posts, 0) AS "Telegram Posts", COALESCE(x_posts.posts, 0) AS "X Posts", COALESCE(discord_posts.posts, 0) + COALESCE(telegram_posts.posts, 0) + COALESCE(x_posts.posts, 0) AS "Total Posts" FROM community_ambassadors ca LEFT JOIN (SELECT ca.ambassador, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages dm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false GROUP BY ca.ambassador) discord_posts ON ca.ambassador = discord_posts.ambassador LEFT JOIN (SELECT ca.ambassador, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ca.ambassador) telegram_posts ON ca.ambassador = telegram_posts.ambassador LEFT JOIN (SELECT ca.ambassador, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts xp JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON xp.username = ca.x_handle WHERE xp.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND xp.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ca.ambassador) x_posts ON ca.ambassador = x_posts.ambassador ORDER BY "Total Posts" DESC;
SELECT role AS "Role", COUNT(*) AS "Count" FROM community_ambassadors GROUP BY role ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

WITH platform_stats AS (SELECT 'Discord' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages dm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false UNION ALL SELECT 'Telegram' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo() UNION ALL SELECT 'X (Twitter)' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts xp JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON xp.username = ca.x_handle WHERE xp.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND xp.created_at <= $__timeTo()) SELECT platform AS "Platform", posts AS "Posts" FROM platform_stats WHERE posts > 0 ORDER BY posts DESC;

SELECT ca.ambassador AS "Ambassador", ca.role AS "Role", COUNT(*) AS "Discord Posts" FROM discord_messages dm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false GROUP BY ca.ambassador, ca.role ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

SELECT ca.ambassador AS "Ambassador", ca.role AS "Role", COUNT(*) AS "Telegram Posts" FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ca.ambassador, ca.role ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

SELECT ca.ambassador AS "Ambassador", ca.role AS "Role", ca.x_handle AS "X Handle", COUNT(*) AS "X Posts" FROM x_posts xp JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON xp.username = ca.x_handle WHERE xp.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND xp.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ca.ambassador, ca.role, ca.x_handle ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

WITH daily_activity AS (SELECT date_trunc('day', dm.created_at) AS time, 'Discord' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM discord_messages dm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON dm.author_id::bigint = ca.discord_id WHERE dm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND dm.created_at <= $__timeTo() AND dm.author_is_bot = false GROUP BY date_trunc('day', dm.created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', tm.created_at) AS time, 'Telegram' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM telegram_messages tm JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON tm.user_id = ca.telegram_id WHERE tm.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND tm.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY date_trunc('day', tm.created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', xp.created_at) AS time, 'X (Twitter)' AS platform, COUNT(*) AS posts FROM x_posts xp JOIN community_ambassadors ca ON xp.username = ca.x_handle WHERE xp.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND xp.created_at <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY date_trunc('day', xp.created_at)) SELECT time, platform AS metric, posts AS value FROM daily_activity ORDER BY time, platform;
